name: Make Your Choice (Concord7)
description:
Make Your Choice is a short text adventure written on the Inform engine. It is inspired by the Saw series and was written as a short exercise in metafiction, with the intent on making the player consider the implications of violent acts enacted within a video game.
There are five total endings, with one of them being more of an easter egg. A hint for the easter egg ending: You need to know the name of the puppet as well as a more obscure, rarely used text adventure command.

To play, unzip the file and click on the "play" html file.
